Name: Discord Bot Workshop [EARLY ACCESS]
About the game: [EARLY ACCESS] Make Discord bots faster, smarter, easier with Discord Bot Workshop. DBW is a way for beginners to work with an extremely user friendly and intuitive workspace and create custom discord bots with ease. Active support and frequent and consistent updates to update you with the very latest Discord features like buttons, dropdowns and even context menus. Discord bot workshop is the most advanced discord bot creator right now holding over 300 unique features in a simple infinite flowchart based node editor. Think something is limited? Easily create your own features with Mods! Mods can be created to add extra features to the app when needed and also many are already available for free! Want to share a command? You can do this in seconds with our raw data feature. In just 2 button presses you can share your commands worldwide with anyone you want! More features: - Embed creating with realistic embed previews - Image creating - Almost every Discord event (member join, member leave etc) - Music features - Spreadsheet reading and writing - Custom code blocks - Reaction nodes - Discord Buttons - Discord Dropdowns - Discord Context Menus - Function calling and creating - Guild only prefixes - Looping actions - Leaderboard creating - Mods + over 200 more features
